headline: Instant, low-fee remittances
description: Afriex makes it easy for immigrants to send money home.  We offer instant, low-fee remittances to over 25 countries around the world.

The app's functionality is seamless and money transfers occur instantly. Indeed, compared to past experiences, Afriex truly stands out. A splendid service, highly recommended!

## A safe space for you and your money
We leverage the best technology to ensure end-to-end encryption of all your transactions—bank-grade security.
[Learn more >](https://www.afriexapp.com/<https:/www.afriexapp.com/post/how-we-prevent-fraud-at-afriex>)
![A purple illustration of a trust shield](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/6606d425bb4624996034d57c_Security-badge-with%20-an-approved-checkmark.svg)
### ISO 27001 certified
Afriex has an Information Security Management System and we are proud to be ISO 27001 certified, demonstrating our commitment to maintaining the highest standards of information security. This certification validates our robust security practices, ensuring the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of sensitive data entrusted to us by our users.
![A purple illustration of a shield](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/6606d42538cee93aec2aa4b2_Badge-with-an-approved-check-mark.svg)
### We are PCI DSS compliant
We are Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard compliant and that makes Afriex very secure. Your information will never be compromised and we will never sell your data. We take the security of your personal information seriously. We encrypt all personal data, so your info is always safe.
![A purple illustration of a padlock](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/6607168ceea8708d51600728_Security-lock.svg)
### Top-notch security
We use industry-standard encryption technology to protect user data. We also use two-factor authentication to verify all customer accounts, so you can be sure that your funds are safe and secure.
![A green illustration of a book](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/6606d42572fd57c7faeab576_book-education.svg)
### User education
We empower our users with security awareness, which is key to maintaining a secure environment. Afriex provides educational resources and tips on security best practices to help users protect themselves from potential threats such as phishing attacks and identity theft.
![The close icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/63888f29719ea6c4477a1e9d_np_close_25798_27313D.svg)

## Some of the things you may want to know
We've provided answers to common questions to save you the trouble of asking.
How does Afriex work?
![A black plus sign](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/65bb64b0bb384741a829b662_Plus.svg)
Afriex is a money-transfer platform that allows you to make instant and affordable money transfers at home and abroad. With Afriex you can send money from USA, UK, Canada, and Europe (France, Italy, Germany, Spain, Ireland, Netherlands, Romania, and Belgium) to Nigeria, Ghana, Cameroon, Ethiopia, Kenya, Uganda, Ivory Coast, Egypt, and Pakistan.
Is Afriex secure?
![A black plus sign](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/65bb64b0bb384741a829b662_Plus.svg)
Afriex is very secure. We take the security of your personal information seriously. We encrypt all personal data, so your info is always safe. We are **Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) compliant.‍** Your information will never be compromised and we will never sell your data
Can I increase my daily limit?
![A black plus sign](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/65bb64b0bb384741a829b662_Plus.svg)
Yes, you can. Please send us an email at **hello@afriex.co**
Do I have to upload my ID?
![A black plus sign](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ce94ab2b9c3a3597a7acd4/65bb64b0bb384741a829b662_Plus.svg)
As part of the regulations in the countries where we operate, we are required by law to verify the identity of every Afriex user.

How does Afriex work?

Is Afriex secure?

### Afriex: Revolutionizing Remittances for the Global Community

**Company Overview:**  
Afriex is a fintech startup that was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in San Francisco, making waves in the payments and remittances sector. As a proud member of the Y Combinator Batch S20, Afriex has positioned itself as a go-to platform for immigrants seeking to send money back home quickly and affordably. With a talented team of 55 employees led by Group Partner Michael Seibel, the company aims to tackle a critical issue faced by immigrants: high fees and delays in international money transfers.

**Mission:**  
The mission of Afriex is straightforward—offering instant, low-fee remittances. They provide a platform where sending money to over 25 countries around the globe can be executed in the blink of an eye. By keeping fees low and processing times short, Afriex redefines the remittance experience.

**Services:**  
Afriex allows users to send money easily and securely, boasting a user-friendly app that facilitates transfers across various currencies including USD, EUR, and GBP. They emphasize providing the best exchange rates, particularly for transactions to African and Asian markets. The platform stands out with features such as:

- Simple sign-up process. 
- Instant crediting of recipients.
- Round-the-clock customer support.
- Strong security measures to protect user data.

**Why Choose Afriex?**  
For those who are navigating the complexities of international money transfers, Afriex's commitment to immigrant communities shines through. Their services are tailored by immigrants, for immigrants, ensuring that both user experience and efficiency are prioritized. 

In the broader landscape of financial technology, Afriex is more than just a remittance service; it represents a bridge for families and communities separated by borders, allowing them to send happiness home in seconds.

Whether you're looking to send money to family, pay bills back home, or support loved ones in need, Afriex is making it easier—and that's a compelling reason to consider their services. Want to learn more? Check out [Afriex's website](https://www.afriexapp.com) and start sending your love today!
